name: Brand Tokens
slogan: Tokenize your brand, reward your customers
description:
Brand Tokens platform allows for issuing brand loyalty tokens on the Blockchain. Unlike loyalty points, tokens are valued in real-time and can be traded and transferred between users. Brands can reward their clients with their own tokens, just like with points, users can redeem them for discount, products and services of the issuer or any other partner of the platform. Tokens also enable users to exchange them for cryptocurrencies or fiat if they wish. 

Brands can use their tokens to acquire new customers or reward loyal clients for purchases, for engagement in social media, participation in events or sharing their personal data, etc.

jobs.title: AI researcher who wants to prepare the world for ASI
jobs.description:
We are building a data company, where users can issue their own personal blockchain-based tokens. Those tokens are backed with attention and incentive structures and represent social activity, status, stakes and relations between users. They are being traded 24/7 evaluating reputation, sentiment and potential of issuers. 
We believe that our unique data set is hiding a lot of mysteries that can lead to discover and better understand human nature, help us answer the questions and prepare us for the upcoming Artificial Super Intelligence.  

If you know tools and ways to aggregate social/transactional data sets, and you know what questions to ask please let us know. 

Interested? Throw us a message and let's talk.

jobs.title: Brand promoters
jobs.description:
**Brand promoters - different backgrounds**

We are a start-up aspiring to change the world of loyalty programs. We have developed a brand new, easy-to-use and highly profitable way to reward consumers and promote brands - all that thanks to tokenization and use of blockchain technology.

We are currently looking for highly motivated professionals to work as Brand Tokens promoters online. We need professionals in different fields, including:
* E-commerce
* Gastronomy
* Retail/sales 
* Automotive
* Communication Technology
* Fashion
* Health and science
* Public and social services

What you will do:
* Initiate, moderate and actively participate in conversations with internet users among different platforms, groups and blogs;
* Search for new ways of communication on a daily basis;
* Think of ways to use the Brand Tokens platform by your field professionals, brands, users. Do you see someone searching for marketing solutions? Do you have ideas on how to make more profit using our platform? Share them with the appropriate people and let them know they should join us!

What we need:
* Good knowledge about your chosen branch of business;
* Amazing research skills and a lot of patience;
* Good knowledge of social media, websites and brands from your field;
* Interest in new technologies and cryptocurrencies will be a plus, but not necessary - you will be provided an introduction and full training before you start working;
* Availability at least 3 hours a day (flexible hours), your own computer and internet access - this is a 100% remote job.
	The form cooperation, salary and all other details will be discussed with chosen applicants. 

Should you be interested, please send your CV, field of interest and information about your availability to our e-mail address: contact@brandtokens.io
We look forward to hearing from you!

jobs.title: Marketing & sales specialist - worldwide
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are a start-up aspiring to change the world of loyalty programs. We have developed a brand new, easy-to-use and highly profitable way to reward consumers and promote brands - all that thanks to tokenization and use of blockchain technology.

We are currently looking for sales specialists with marketing/PR experience in various locations, including London, NYC, Tokyo, Seoul, Paris, Beijing & Shanghai. We will consider candidates from any location, as long as you match our requirements. This is a perfect opportunity for a remote, flexible, part-time job. Itâ€™s up to you how much you work - we only care about the results!

We are now building a team of sales professionals to get in touch with brands and present them with our product. You will be responsible for showing Brand Tokens platform to brands and explaining profits from switching to this innovative technology for the brand and its clients. Brand Tokens are dedicated to brands of all sizes, wanting to establish their loyalty programs in an easy, effective and highly profitable way.

Your daily tasks will include:

  • Establishing contacts with new B2B customers;
  • Editing and implementing newsletters and emails;
  • Working with the design and business departments;
  • Building brand awareness and market position of Brand Tokens;
  • Educating customers on new technologies.

What we expect from you:

  • High interpersonal skills;
  • Experience in actively acquiring new customers and selling services and/or products;
  • Experience in conducting business meetings;
  • Very good organisation of working time;
  • Independence and commitment in action;
  • Good knowledge of English in speech and writing (min. B2);
  • Interest in the mobile market and new technologies will be a big plus.

What we offer:

  • Attractive compensation system - commision on each subscription contracted;
  • Long-term cooperation and possible salary negotiation after the initial period;
  • Participation in the development of the global start-up of Brand Tokens;
  • Interesting work and high level of independence;
  • Possibility to improve your qualifications and introduce your own solutions;
  • Flexible working time and 100% remote work.

Apply now!
